goals.active: Investigate the Abandoned Caverns with Forktail.
goals.complete: Forktail and I stormed the Abandoned Caverns and stopped Mergath's ritual. I believe Forktail has redeemed himself, and so I will appeal to Rytlock to have my sire's sentence reduced.

goals.active: Report to Rytlock in the Black Citadel for debriefing.
goals.complete: I reported the results of my mission to Rytlock. After I explained how my sire redeemed himself and how instrumental he was to my success, Rytlock agreed to release him from the stockade.
